proposedChanges.value: Add a concise subheadline below the main headline.
proposedChanges.rationale: This will immediately clarify the product's core benefit.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure hero CTA is a contrasting button for visibility.
proposedChanges.rationale: Increases the likelihood of conversion by drawing attention.

proposedChanges.value: Move the solution section above the problem section.
proposedChanges.rationale: Prioritizing solutions can engage users by showing benefits first.

proposedChanges.value: Use a side-by-side comparison layout for pricing.

proposedChanges.rationale: Builds trust at a critical decision point.

proposedChanges.value: Add a sticky CTA button in the navigation bar.
proposedChanges.rationale: Ensures that users can easily convert at any point.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure hero elements stack with main CTA visible first.
proposedChanges.rationale: Prioritizes action over information on mobile.

proposedChanges.value: Include data privacy and security badges near CTA.
proposedChanges.rationale: Reassures users about data safety at key conversion points.

risks: Changes may disrupt existing user flow
Design alterations may affect brand perception
assumptions: User base values clarity and simplicity
